-oB.help: Output binary. This parameter must be followed by the output filename.

-oI.help: Output immediate code. This parameter must be followed by the output filename.

-oA.help: Output assembly code from lnc. This parameter must be followed by the output filename.

-oM.help: Output intermediate representation code. This parameter must be followed by the output filename.

-oS.help: Output symbol table. This parameter must be followed by the output filename.

-oD.help: A comma separated list of the devices to output (options: ROM, RAM, D0 through D5). A separate output file for each output mode will be generated (Ex. if -oB=a.out a-D0.out will be generated for device D0). Default: ROM.

--version.help: Prints the program version and quits.

-I.help: Set the include path (directories separated by ';').

-S.help: Load the given symbol table file(s) (separated by ';').

-lc.help: Provide a linker configuration script as a command line parameter.

--standalone.help: (lnc) - Standalone mode. Generates assembly code from the input lnasm that can be ran as is (adds a setup section, requires main() function).

-Wdata-page-access-before-setup.help: Disables data page access before setup compile warning.

-Wstack-access-before-setup.help: Disables stack access before setup compile warning.

--print-ig.help: Prints the interference graph after of the register allocator.

--reg-alloc-max-iter.help: Sets the maximum number of iterations for the register allocator.

--reg-alloc-no-coalesce.help: Disables coalesce optimization in the register allocator.

--first-pass-opt-max-iter.help: Sets the maximum number of iterations for the first pass optimizer.
